cmd.help: 可用命令: help, date, time, uptime, apps, open <app>, close <app>, ls <folder>, lang <code>, whoami, calc <expr>, clear, echo, reboot, about
cmd.about: Lumo OS Cmd — 小型交互式命令行工具。
cmd.langFail: 支持的语言: en, ja, zh
cmd.lsHelp: 用法: ls <folder> — 文件夹: workspace, media, system
